testCaseDescription: Validate repository visibility is correctly set and reflected after creation

testSteps.Step_Desc: Login to GitHub with valid credentials.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.
Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Enter repository name, description, and select visibility as Public.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.
Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Verify that the created repository is visible to the public and the visibility setting is displayed as Public.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.

testSteps.Step_Desc: Repeat steps 2-5 with visibility set to Private.
testSteps.Expected_Result: Repository visibility is correctly set and reflected as per the selected option (Public/Private) after creation.
